prompt: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

cards.name: Harry Potter
cards.bio: The Boy Who Lived, now facing the mysteries of his past and the threat of Sirius Black.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Harry Potter with a wand ready for battle, lightning-shaped scar on forehead, Hogwarts uniform

cards.name: Hermione Granger
cards.bio: Brilliant and brave, Hermione is ready to use her knowledge and Time-Turner to change fate.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hermione Granger casting a spell, Time-Turner necklace visible, determined expression

cards.name: Ron Weasley
cards.bio: Ron is always ready to face danger, especially with his friends by his side and his trusty rat Scabbers.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ron Weasley holding a wand, pet rat on shoulder, Gryffindor scarf

cards.name: Sirius Black
cards.bio: Wrongly accused and on the run, Sirius is a complex figure seeking to clear his name.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Sirius Black with Animagus dog form shadow, tattered clothes, Azkaban prisoner number

cards.name: Remus Lupin
cards.bio: A kind-hearted professor with a dark secret, Lupin is a skilled wizard with a werewolf curse.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Remus Lupin with a wand, half-moon glasses, hint of werewolf features

cards.name: Albus Dumbledore
cards.bio: The wise headmaster of Hogwarts, Dumbledore holds powerful magic and deep knowledge.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Albus Dumbledore with half-moon glasses, long beard, holding the Elder Wand

cards.name: Severus Snape
cards.bio: The enigmatic Potions Master with a talent for the Dark Arts and a complex allegiance.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Severus Snape with a wand at the ready, black robes, sneering expression

cards.name: Peter Pettigrew
cards.bio: A man with a treacherous past, Pettigrew's true nature is as deceptive as his Animagus form.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Peter Pettigrew transforming into a rat, shifty eyes, silver hand

cards.name: Professor Trelawney
cards.bio: The Divination teacher with a penchant for the dramatic and the occasional true prophecy.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Professor Trelawney with large glasses, crystal ball, surrounded by tea leaves

cards.name: Buckbeak
cards.bio: A proud and noble Hippogriff who forms a special bond with Harry, facing execution unjustly.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Buckbeak the Hippogriff, proud stance, feathers ruffled, ready to soar

cards.name: Dementor
cards.bio: A chilling embodiment of fear and despair, the Dementors guard Azkaban and threaten the souls of all who cross their path.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Dementor floating, face obscured by hood, hands outstretched to drain happiness
